channel.title: Samsung Captivate get's a compatible leaked Gingerbread
channel.description:
For all the Samsung Captivate users, there is a leaked version of Gingerbread that all the reviews say works extremely well. I flashed Froyo on my Captivate a few days after I got it, so I'm going to flash Gingerbread and see how it is. There is a "Odin-1-Click" program that is supposed to make the flashing fairly easy.
http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1127249
I will let you know the outcome as soon as the download is finished.

item.title: Samsung Captivate get's a compatible leaked Gingerbread
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

For all the Samsung Captivate users, there is a leaked version of Gingerbread that all the reviews say works extremely well. I flashed Froyo on my Captivate a few days after I got it, so I’m going to flash Gingerbread and see how it is. There is a “Odin-1-Click” program that is supposed to make the flashing fairly easy.

[ROM]I897UCKF1 Odin-1-Click Gingerbread 2.3.3 w/ Optional Fugu Root

I take no responsibility if your phone becomes a brick. You should be fully aware of all risks associated with flashing a rom with bootloaders prior to fl…

I will let you know the outcome as soon as the download is finished.
